SELECT id, sender_id, chat_id, content, message_type, read_status, is_recalled, user_ip, source, reply_to_message_id, thread_id, is_show_time, created_at, updated_at FROM message WHERE thread_id = #{parentMessageId} ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) as messageCount, COUNT(DISTINCT sender_id) as participantCount, MAX(created_at) as lastReplyTime, (SELECT sender_id FROM message WHERE thread_id = #{parentMessageId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1) as lastReplyUserId, (SELECT u.username FROM user u INNER JOIN message m ON u.id = m.sender_id WHERE m.thread_id = #{parentMessageId} ORDER BY m.created_at DESC LIMIT 1) as lastReplyUser FROM message WHERE thread_id = #{parentMessageId}

SELECT DISTINCT m.thread_id as threadId, (SELECT content FROM message WHERE id = m.thread_id) as parentMessageContent, (SELECT sender_id FROM message WHERE id = m.thread_id) as threadCreatorId, (SELECT u.username FROM user u WHERE u.id = (SELECT sender_id FROM message WHERE id = m.thread_id)) as threadCreator, MAX(m.created_at) as lastReplyTime, COUNT(*) as replyCount, COUNT(DISTINCT m.sender_id) as participantCount FROM message m WHERE m.sender_id = #{userId} AND m.thread_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.thread_id ORDER BY lastReplyTime DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT thread_id) FROM message WHERE sender_id = #{userId} AND thread_id IS NOT NULL
